subtitle.Text: The boxes of tampons that you can find in the washrooms around the house, they weren’t originally on the list of items that needed to be modelled,
but when you’re creating a bathroom at that level of fidelity and when you’re creating a bathroom for a teenage girl, no less,
the idea of not having something like that is kind of jarring, or it was kind of jarring to me.
Especially because when you’re at that age your period is something that kind of really defines your mood on any given day,
maybe what you wear and where you go so, you know, I just thought it was, you know,
something necessary for visual storytelling, especially for a girl going through what she’s going through.
